Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Batch API support for bulk translations (50% discount)

Batch API Implementation:
- Implemented Claude Batch API in ClaudeApiService
  * createBatchTranslation() - Submit up to 100,000 translations
  * getBatchStatus() - Check batch processing status
  * getBatchResults() - Download completed results (JSONL)
  * cancelBatch() - Cancel running batch
  * listBatches() - List all batch jobs
  
- Implemented OpenAI Batch API in ChatGptApiService
  * createBatchTranslation() - Submit up to 50,000 translations (JSONL upload)
  * uploadBatchFile() - Upload JSONL to Files API
  * createBatchJob() - Create batch job with file ID
  * getBatchStatus() - Check batch status
  * getBatchResults() - Download and parse JSONL results
  * cancelBatch() - Cancel running batch
  * listBatches() - List all batch jobs

API Endpoints (routes/api.php):
- POST /api/v1/batch/claude - Create Claude batch
- POST /api/v1/batch/chatgpt - Create ChatGPT batch
- GET /api/v1/batch/{provider}/{batchId}/status - Check status
- GET /api/v1/batch/{provider}/{batchId}/results - Get results
- POST /api/v1/batch/{provider}/{batchId}/cancel - Cancel batch
- GET /api/v1/batch/{provider}?limit=20 - List batches

CLI Command (batch:translate):
- php artisan batch:translate {provider} --create --input=file.csv
- php artisan batch:translate {provider} --status=BATCH_ID
- php artisan batch:translate {provider} --results=BATCH_ID
- php artisan batch:translate {provider} --cancel=BATCH_ID
- php artisan batch:translate {provider} --list
- CSV format: id,text,from,to
- Beautiful colored output with progress info
- Results saved to batch-results-{id}.jsonl

Controller Updates:
- Added 5 new batch methods to TranslationController
- OpenAPI annotations for all batch endpoints
- Added "Batch" tag to Swagger documentation
- Validation for batch requests (max 100k/50k items)

Key Features:
- 💰 50% cost reduction on both Claude and ChatGPT
- ⚡ Process up to 100,000 translations in one batch (Claude)
- ⚡ Process up to 50,000 translations in one batch (ChatGPT)
- ⏱️ 24-hour processing window (usually much faster)
- 📊 Real-time status tracking
- 🔄 Automatic JSONL parsing for results
- ✅ Markdown cleanup for ChatGPT results
- 📁 CSV input support for CLI

Documentation:
- Updated README with comprehensive Batch API section
- CLI usage examples with CSV format
- REST API examples with curl
- Batch workflow (create → status → results)
- Highlighted 50% discount benefits
- Added batch feature to main features list

Technical Details:
- Claude: Direct JSON API (requests array)
- ChatGPT: JSONL file upload + batch job creation
- Both: Async processing with status polling
- Results: JSONL format, parsed line-by-line
- Error handling for incomplete batches

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
